name: Natero
long_description:
Natero helps Customer Success Managers reduce churn, increase expansion, and manage more accounts with less effort.

Natero is the only Customer Success solution to combine predictive analytics, customer intelligence, and workflow management in a unified platform. This next generation solution helps B2B software providers prioritize, automate, and scale their Customer Success processes.
one_liner: Data-driven customer success platform for B2B SaaS.
